## Protocol.DOMDebugger.SetEventListenerBreakpointRequest interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SetEventListenerBreakpointRequest 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [eventName](./puppeteer.protocol.domdebugger.seteventlistenerbreakpointrequest.eventname.md) | string | DOM Event name to stop on (any DOM event will do). |
|  [targetName](./puppeteer.protocol.domdebugger.seteventlistenerbreakpointrequest.targetname.md) | string | EventTarget interface name to stop on. If equal to <code>&quot;*&quot;</code> or not provided, will stop on any EventTarget. |
